verses.verse: Therefore, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you, O <S%H1463>Gog,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal:<s%>

And I will <S%H7725>turn<s%> you <S%H7725>back,<s%> and <S%H8338>leave<s%> but the <S%H8338>sixth<s%> part of you, and will cause you to <S%H5927>come<s%> up from the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3411>parts,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> you on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

And I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> your <S%H7198>bow<s%> out of your <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and will cause your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> out of your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

You shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H102>bands,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that is with you: I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you to the <S%H5861>ravenous<s%> <S%H6833>birds<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>sort,<s%> and to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> to be <S%H402>devoured.<s%>
You shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field:<s%> for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on <S%H4031>Magog,<s%> and among them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>carelessly<s%> in the <S%H339>isles:<s%> and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So will I make my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and I will not let them <S%H2490>pollute<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%> any <S%H5750>more:<s%> and the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> it is <S%H935>come,<s%> and it is done, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

And they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and shall <S%H1197>set<s%> on <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H5400>burn<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons,<s%> both the <S%H4043>shields<s%> and the <S%H6793>bucklers,<s%> the <S%H7198>bows<s%> and the <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> and the hand <S%H4731>staves,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and the <S%H7420>spears,<s%> and they shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> them with <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%>

So that they shall <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H2404>cut<s%> down any out of the <S%H3293>forests;<s%> for they shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> the <S%H5402>weapons<s%> with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and they shall <S%H7997>spoil<s%> those that <S%H7997>spoiled<s%> them, and <S%H962>rob<s%> those that <S%H962>robbed<s%> them, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H1463>Gog<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> of <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> on the <S%H6926>east<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%> and it shall <S%H2629>stop<s%> the noses of the <S%H5674>passengers:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall they <S%H6912>bury<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1995>multitude:<s%> and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> it The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamongog.<s%>
And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6912>burying<s%> of them, that they may <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Yes, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> them; and it shall be to them a <S%H8034>renown<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I shall be <S%H3513>glorified,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And they shall <S%H914>sever<s%> out <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H8548>continual<s%> employment, <S%H5674>passing<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> with the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> those that <S%H3498>remain<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it: after the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%> shall they <S%H2713>search.<s%>

And the <S%H5674>passengers<s%> that <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> when any <S%H7200>sees<s%> a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H6106>bone,<s%> then shall he <S%H1129>set<s%> up a <S%H6725>sign<s%> by it, <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H6912>buriers<s%> have <S%H6912>buried<s%> it in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H1996>Hamongog.<s%>
And <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H1997>Hamonah.<s%> Thus shall they <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And, you <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H559>Speak<s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3671>feathered<s%> <S%H6833>fowl,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H6908>Assemble<s%> yourselves, and <S%H935>come;<s%> <S%H622>gather<s%> yourselves on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side<s%> to my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> that I do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> for you, even a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> of <S%H352>rams,<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and of <S%H6260>goats,<s%> of <S%H6499>bullocks,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them fatted <S%H4806>calves<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> till you be <S%H7654>full,<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> till you be <S%H7943>drunken,<s%> of my <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> for you.

Thus you shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> my <S%H7979>table<s%> with <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> with <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, and with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H4941>judgment<s%> that I have <S%H6213>executed,<s%> and my <S%H3027>hand<s%> that I have <S%H7760>laid<s%> on them.
So the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>forward.<s%>

And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, therefore <S%H5641>hid<s%> I my <S%H6440>face<s%> from them, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H6862>enemies:<s%> so <S%H5307>fell<s%> they <S%H3605>all<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>
According to their <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> and according to their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> have I <S%H6213>done<s%> to them, and <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from them.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> will I <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name;<s%>

After that they have <S%H5375>borne<s%> their <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4604>trespasses<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> they have <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, when they <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> in their <S%H127>land,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> made them <S%H2729>afraid.<s%>

When I have <S%H7725>brought<s%> them <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them out of their <S%H341>enemies'<s%> <S%H776>lands,<s%> and am <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations;<s%>

Then shall they <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> which caused them to be led into <S%H1473>captivity<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> but I have <S%H3664>gathered<s%> them to their own <S%H127>land,<s%> and have <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> of them any <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> will I <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> any <S%H5750>more<s%> from them: for I have <S%H8210>poured<s%> out my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
